description: [di][periodIdIx idx] = The fiscal quarter for this financial period
[di][periodIdIx idx] = calculated periodicity that corresponds to a particular financial period
[di][periodIdIx idx] = calculated periodicity using actuals and estimates and reflects 12-month data
[di][periodIdIx idx] = The fiscal year for this financial period
[di][periodIdIx idx] = A relative constant applies to periodic items only
[di][recommedationScaleId] = recommendation code received from the contributing broker
[di][recommedationScaleId] = The standardized S&P Capital IQ recommendation field (1~5 scale, 6 is NA)
